name: Path T Pleura
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  The TNM staging system applies only to pleural mesotheliomas. Peritoneal and pericardial mesotheliomas are not TNM staged.

**Note 2:**  Pleural effusion does not affect the coding Clinical and Pathologic T, but is coded in Site-Specific Factor 1.

**Note 3:**  T3 describes locally advanced, but potentially resectable tumor.

**Note 4:**  T4 describes locally advanced, technically unresectable tumor.
